Install
```````


.. code:: bash

	`[sudo] pip install query_string`





Usage
`````


.. code:: python

	>>> from query_string import query_string

	>>> query_string(url)



Examples
````````


.. code:: python

	>>> query_string('https://site.org/index.php?k=v&k2=v2&k3=v3#anchor')
	{'k': 'v','k2': 'v2', 'k3': 'v3'}

	>>> query_string('k=v&k2=v2&k3=v3')
	{'k': 'v','k2': 'v2', 'k3': 'v3'}
